summary:
Phishing is a scam where hackers trick people into giving away personal details or downloading harmful software. They create fake websites that look real, so when you enter information, they can see it. Phishing is now the most common cybercrime, with many people falling for these tricks.

The word "phishing" has been around since the 1990s and comes from the idea of "fishing" for information using lures. To stay safe, you should learn about these scams, be careful with emails and websites, and use security tools. It's important to protect yourself online.
title: Phishing
